sub_title: ON LEAVE- Resource Specialist - Recruiter - Recruiting Consultant - at Ctac
summary:
I am a huge people-person, I love meeting new people and helping them. I am curious towards learning new things and exploring countries. 
For the bigger part of my life I lived in Italy however I have been on the move ever since. I lived in Belgium, Spain, Portugal, Canada and finally the Netherlands where I currently reside. The moving around has made a very open-minded and flexible person, able to adapt to every kind of situation and culture. 
How am I as a person? a perfectionist, I love to learn new things and the rush a job can bring, everything I do is thought through, adaptable to new situations and in control are traits that define me.  Due to my moving around I speak several languages, but as you can imagine maths and I do not get along!
Always on the look for something new where I can learn new things, I like to take responsibility. You could also say I am a troubleshooter by nature.

projects.title: Flood-Wise
projects.description:
I was the leader for a project in collaboration with Zuyd , the province of Limburg and the EU.
The name of the project was Flood-Wise where managers from various European countries exchanged experiences with flood risk management. 
The objective of FLOODWISE was to improve cross-border flood risk management in European river basins that cross national borders. The part my group and I focused on were the Good Practices.

profile_positions.description:
The right candidate for the right client. That's what Ctac Resourcing stands for. For a temporary completion of an ICT function your request will be in good hands with us. CTAC Resourcing operates mainly in the field of SAP and Microsoft. We can draw from over 400 experienced consultants at Ctac in permanent employment. We also have an extensive and high-quality pool of freelancers in the SAP and Microsoft market. We understand the individual needs of the client and know the possibilities of our candidates. The goal is to find the perfect match. 

For each SAP and Microsoft vacancy among our clients we know to find an appropriate candidate. Our commitment goes beyond finding the right match, after completion we remain in contact with our clients and we  follow the development of the selected candidate.
Are you looking for a SAP or Microsoft consultant on a temporary basis? Then you are at the right place at Ctac Resourcing. My job at Ctac is to find the right match!

My pool consists of professionals in the areas of:

SAP 
ABAP
ABAP OO
ABAP Webdynpro
SAP BI
SAP BO-BW
HANA
SAP PI-PO
UI5
Smartform

SOA - Service-Oriented Architecture

Mendix

Are you a professional and looking for a suitable position on one of these areas, do not hesitate and contact us!
Additional tasks: Process development.
profile_positions.title: Resource Specialist - Recruiter - Recruiting Consultant - Freelance market

profile_positions.description:
Amnesty International has a large number of regional offices, one of which is the Eindhoven office. This office is mostly run by volounteers, each group of volounteers has its specialty, mine is the schooling department. Here, I am the leader of the group.

Responsibilities:

- Set-up meetings with schools
- Set-up meetings with the other volounteers
- Teaching children and youngsters about AI and Human Rights
- Dividing tasks amongst volounteers
- Recruiting new volounteers
- Creating and setting-up classes

Skills: time management, recruting, psychology, people management, organizing.
profile_positions.title: Volunteer head of the schooling department Eindhoven region

profile_positions.description:
As an inhouse deployment specialist I take care of both recruitment and human resource activities.
I am the to-go-to person for interims, I show them around, I interview them and offer them a job. I keep an eye on planning, remuneration, (pay) sick leave and contracts.  In the meanwhile I keep in touch with the managers of the different departments, to see if they need new employees and if they are content with the ones I provided. A few days a week I am to be found at the Municipality of Eindhoven where I interview potential candidates and where I keep an eye on subsidies. I was involved with the set-up of process for a new client.
profile_positions.title: Inhouse deployment specialist

profile_positions.description:
The ICRC fucuses on humanitarian relief aid, it does not only help during war time but also humanitarian disasters such as for example the great influx of (Syrian) refugees to Europe. One of the taks of the Rec Cross is to set-up crisis centres for refugees, this is done in close collaboration with COA (is responsible for the reception, supervision and departure (from the reception location) of asylum seekers coming to the Netherlands), municipalities, security and the fire department. 

Duties:
-  Helping with the set-up of crisis centers and temporary accomodation for refugees
- On site coordination of volounteers
- Recruiting volounteers
- Provide volounteers with the right fit tasks
- Coordination of volounteers at the Tilburg Welkom Winkel
- Human Resources

Sillks: time management, psychology, planning, people management, organizing, recruiting, HR.

profile_positions.description:
Brabantia is leading in the market of kitchenware. It is represented all over the world and has international offices and production facilities on various locations worldwide.

Duties:

- Research: the implementation of European Labour Law on a national level,with a specific focus on women, maternity leave, paternal leave, unemployment regulations, trade unions, and salary. The focus was on the following countries: Austria, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy	and Latvia. 

- Organization: of paperwork and meetings
- Contact with clients, meeting with clients
- Small translations
- CV screening of potential employees/recruting 
- Screening of contracts with clients/recruiting
- Advise/ help with job interviews
- Setting- up new contracts
- Advise Brabantia and clients on contracts
- Setting up pick-ups
- Office /project management

Skills: 

Professionalism, research, observation, time-management. people management.

I worked as an informant/hostess at the Brussesl car expo, for Seat.

Responsibilities:

- Inform them about the special offers
- Setting up car try-outs

Skills: professionalism and  clarity. 

Extra: training on how to approach and communicate with clients, technical training about the product. I was elected as the best informant.
profile_positions.title: Informant

volunteer_experiences.description:
Amnesty International is a global movement of more than 7 million people who take injustice personally.  It is independent of any political ideology, economic interest or religion.They investigate and expose the facts, whenever and wherever abuses happen. They lobby governments, and other powerful groups such as companies. Making sure they keep their promises and respect international law. By telling the powerful stories of the people they work with, they mobilize millions of supporters around the world to campaign for change and to stand in defence of activists on the frontline. They investigate and expose the facts, whenever and wherever abuses happen. 

Why I joined this cause: 

- I believe in a world where every person- regardless of race, religion, ethnicity, sexual orientation or gender identity – enjoys all of the human rights enshrined in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR) and other internationally recognized human rights standards
- I believe in research to keep a vigilant eye on the rights of people
- I belive that both action and advocacy are key elements in the prevention for human rights abuses worldwide
- I belive that our children and future generations need to know and learn about past mistakes and about the rights they held as individuals

The ICRC responds quickly and efficiently to help people affected by armed conflict. They also respond to disasters in conflict zones, because the effects of a disaster are compounded if a country is already at war. Emergencies are unpredictable, so our rapid deployment capability is hugely important.

Why I joined this cause:

- I believe that a war free world is a better world, but that if war is ongoing that international standards such as the Geneva conventions and their Addirional protocols should be resepcted
- I belive in helping and protecting civilians
- I believe that cooperation with national societies and corporations can make a big difference
- I believe that people are less empathic towards individuals and situations they cannot relate to 
- I belive that during war times many crimes are committied that are not apparent to the bare eye and that victims are embarassed and afraid to come forward
During my exchange period at UPEI I helped a friend with the set-up of a LGBTI conference at the University.
